eu.ehri.extension

Class GroupResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.extension.AbstractRestResource
      • eu.ehri.extension.AbstractAccessibleEntityResource<Group>
        • eu.ehri.extension.GroupResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeleteResource, GetResource, ListResource, TxCheckedResource, UpdateResource

    public class GroupResource
extends AbstractAccessibleEntityResource<Group>
implements GetResource, ListResource, UpdateResource, DeleteResource
    Provides a web service interface for the Group model.
    Author:
    Mike Bryant (http://github.com/mikesname)

      • list

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response list()
                               throws BadRequester
        Description copied from interface: ListResource
        List available resources. The default behaviour is to return a page of 20 items.

        The default list limit can be overridden using the limit parameter, and disabled completely using a value of -1.

        Item lists are paginated using the page parameter.

        The page, limit, and total number of items is returned in the Content-Range response header in the form: 

        page=1; count=20; total=50
        If the header X-Stream is set to true no count of total items will be performed. This is more efficient when returning large numbers of items or when limiting is disabled completely.

        Example: 

         
 curl http://localhost:7474/ehri/[RESOURCE]/list?page=5&limit=10
        Specified by:
        list in interface ListResource
        Returns:
        A list of serialized item representations
        Throws:
        BadRequester
